title: News (EP)
text:
News (ニュース) is the fifth extended play by Japanese rock band <a href="Tokyo%20Jihen">Tokyo Jihen</a>. It was released on April 8, 2020 through <a href="Universal%20Music">Universal Music</a>. The album was produced by the band and Japanese <a href="Audio%20engineer">recording engineer</a> Uni Inoue. On January 1, 2020, the single "Erabarezaru Kokumin" was released along with the tour "Live Tour 2020 News Flash", which began February 29 and ended April 9. The tour started on the same day they dissolved on February 29, 2012, a leap day.
Track listing.
All lyrics written by <a href="Ringo%20Sheena">Ringo Sheena</a> and all tracks arranged by <a href="Tokyo%20Jihen">Tokyo Jihen</a>.
All official international English titles from <a href="Tidal%20%28service%29">Tidal</a>.
Personnel.
Credits adapted from Tidal.
Tokyo Jihen
